plot: Jo Jones, a young defense plant worker whose husband is in the military during World War II, shares a house with three other women in the same situation.
title: Compañero de mi vida
plot_es: Jo Jones, a young defense plant worker whose husband is in the military during World War II, shares a house with three other women in the same situation.
plot_en: Jo Jones, a young defense plant worker whose husband is in the military during World War II, shares a house with three other women in the same situation.
